EmailTemplate.name: 201711_Global_HAT_777_ses.201711_Global_Email_HAT_777_ses
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Aerospace Trading Acquires Boeing 777
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Honeywell Customer:
Honeywell Aerospace Trading recently acquired strategic components for a Boeing 777 aircraft growing our already large inventory. Removed components of the 777 series aircraft are fully re-certified and available for sale or exchange from the new Honeywell Distribution Center in Phoenix, AZ
Honeywell Aerospace Trading has an extensive inventory of new surplus and reconditioned Honeywell and non-Honeywell equipment that enables you to quickly access the parts you need when you need them. All of our equipment is available for immediate purchase and complies with the highest international standards and regulations for quality. For more information, please contact us by phone at 1-866-TALK-HAT ( 1-866-825-5428 <[[#]]>) or by email aerospace.trading@honeywell.com <[[mailto:aerospace.trading@honeywell.com]]>.
LEARN MORE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/HAT_B777.html]]>
